content: I have modified the problem statement slightly, and have voted to approve this puzzle. Well done. Thanks for the submission.

Thanks magaiti and JBM for your replies. I really appreciate your comments.

I do intend to make this puzzle kind of easy and fun!

However if the description is not clear, I can change it.

I'd appreciate an actual sentence describing (and more importantly, *specifying*) what's expected, instead of a template input/output.

Ideally, it would answer the question of the number of expected output lines.

Because right now it looks like it's dependent on the number of leaves in the tree, and distinguishing nodes from leaves in a genealogy tree is anything but natural.

It seems relatively easy, compared to other puzzles.
However, there is a few approved puzzles probably even simpler than this.

Thanks for the feedback. Looking through the types of problems in the standard set of Easy and Medium puzzles, I'd say that this falls pretty squarely in the range of "hardest easy" to "easiest medium". While a bit easy for my taste as well, it is within the range of acceptable difficulty for a community puzzle. I am going to go ahead and accept it.
Thanks so much for your input in the problem statement. It really made it much more clear.
